name: Ultimate Mushroom Damocles Revenger
description:
Use Fullscreen button in the bottom right corner !

“As Hero of the Mushroom people, to you, I say this: N0. M0RE. Too long have we been living in fear. Too long this sword of Damoclès has been dangling over our heads. That is enough! I will go to the kitchen of hell and defeat the murderous hand that has been smiting our people for hundreds of years. Never again will we live in the shadow and fear of the great cleaver. We will never be slaves! We will be conquerors.”

Avenge the Mushroom people by avoiding the cleavers and provoking the murderous hand in single combat. Win and free your people forever!

Keyboard WASD/ZQSD or arrows to move and jump. Space bar to attack.

Controller Left joystick to move and jump. X button to attack.

This is a rhythm game, so pump up the volume!
